Translations.Text: When they told Pojdem let posol GOD pray tvoj forgiveness they mockingly turn ich riaditel ona see them zapudit others cin arrogantly
bol the same them whether ona pray ich forgiveness nie pray ich forgiveness; GOD will nie forgive them! For GOD nie guide zlomyselny ludia
They bol jeden say nie dat any peniaze those nasledovat posol GOD perhaps they zhyraly him! GOD possesses treasures z heavens zem hypocrites nie comprehend
They say my ist mesto mocny therein evict chaby my victimized (They zauzlit ze) all dignity belongs do GOD Jeho posol believers! However hypocrites nie zauzlit
O ona verit nie zmateny tvoj peniaze tvoj dieta zapamatat si GOD Those robit this bol losers
Ona dat our provisions ona smrt pojdem ona potom ona say Moj Lord len Ona zdrzat this short chvila! Ja potom bol charitable join the righteous
GOD never ZDRZAT appointed cas SMRT any soul. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
